results = evaluate_models(trainX, trainy, testX, testy, models)
# summarize results
summarize_results(results)
Listing 23.14: Example of evaluating machine learning models for activity recognition on the
raw dataset.
Running the example ﬁrst loads the dataset. Next the eight deﬁned models are evaluated in
turn. The ﬁnal results suggest that ensembles of decision trees perform the best on the raw
data. Gradient Boosting and Extra Trees perform the best with about 87% and 86% accuracy,
